一代永远是求生之路老玩家心中永恒的经典。想当年一代独树一帜，而如今却被二代的气势压下去了。
一代所有的（恐怖，生存难度），二代没有，二代所有的（新特感，材质，模型，脚本，游戏模式，杀丧尸的欢乐，地图变大等等），一代没有。
总而言之，一代经典的恐怖氛围特色，是二代无法超越的。
Awesome game it's the original & the best in my book. what's not to love, if u like Zombies you'll love L4D the best zombie game i have ever played

우연히 지인의 집에서 접하게 되었는데, 충분히 소장 가능성을 느끼고 라이브러리로 모셔온 게임. 

일반 무뇌에 그저 천천히 걸어오는 대량 총알받이 좀비와는 다르게, 좀비도 조직력과 날렵함, 개성을 가진 특정 케릭터가 존재한다는 관점이 신선했다. 

멀티 플레이 중심 게임으로 싱글은 같은 인원의 AI들과 진행이다.

One of my top three list of prefered zombie survival games. Excellent replay value, especially if one wants to acquire all of the additional achievements. This game is best played on PC versus console (XBOX 360) although I wish the PC version had a quick 180 degree turn around button/key like the console version has but that is to make up for the slowness of the console version I believe. All-in-all just get this game if you are into the zombie survival themed games!

Лучший coop шутер современности. Все последующие кооперативные шутеры сравниваются именно с l4d и берут что-то от него. Идеальная формула гейминга с друзьями. ...и еще здесь есть зомби!!! Рекомендую!
Fantastic game, this being my very first game played on the Xbox 360 it was  a must have for me.

Left 4 Dead set a high standard for video games when it was released: Fun theme, persistant stats, single-player/co-op/multiplayer modes, easily updated. 

The theme is zombie apocolypse. Normal campaign mode involves 4 survivors, and can be done with CPUs or live players in 6 different maps. Fighting through towns and cities, driving off random hoardes of zombies, and surviving through an epic finale are a part of all maps, which are of better quality than the new ones put into the second L4D game, L4D2. The weapons do not vary however, and the game does get a bit boring after a while. Both problems are solved moslty in L4D2.

There are extra game modes to spice up the game a bit, and the classic group of Bill, Zoey, Francis, and Louis is always a blast to play. Although now outdated, there is no denying the importance of ths game in the development of FPSs and zombie shooters.

Left 4 Dead is a 6 out of 10.
Exelente juego para jugar con amigos.
I realized about 2 years later, that I had stopped playing this game with 133.7 hours played...

With December 20, 2012 rapidly approaching, I decided that this game might be a good investment as a way to prepare myself for the coming zombie apocolypse.  Using the same engine as Portal, Team Fortess 2 and Half-Life, this game is as much a first-person shooter as those other ones.  I'm not a huge 1st-person shooter fan but I can still have a little fun with them if they have good controls and I don't die every 16.3 seconds.  After playing the first campaign, I can say that this game is pretty good for it's type but there is a LOT of room for improvement(hopefully when I move on to L4D2 those improvements will have occurred).  In a hospital...everyone is a zombie...why aren't there more first aid kits and pain pills to be found?  On the streets....been 2 weeks since the outbreak...why do cars STILL have thier headlights on?  Yeah, it's a good game but there are a lot of inconsistencies that really add up to be rather annoying.  Why can't I carry 8 pipe bombs?  Sheesh..
Si tienes amigos con los que te coordinas, este juego te depará horas y horas. ¿Dejarás que los zombies te hagan uno más? ¿Serás "dado por muerto" entre tus amigos?

Get the second one.

Left 4 Dead is my all time favorite zombie survival game.  The simple mechanics of the gameplay and the increasing ramp of difficulty is well balanced in my personal opinion.  It's great for a 20 minute gaming session on Normal, and up to two hours on Expert.

But my favorite way to play is on the original campaign, but in Left 4 Dead 2.  More monsters, more weapons and, best of all, harder zombies.
The best zombie killing game ever created.

You are left for dead in Left 4 dead, Playing as one of four Survivors you must make it to A to B  without  getting beaten up by the Infected (Think 24 days later)

The Real challenge however is finding 3 of your most useless friends and stop them from killing each other. Fantastic fun and a great way to kill an hour or each other.
I was a big time PS3 user not to long ago, and always wanted to try this game. It exceeded my expectations, and to me will always be the greatest zombie game ever! (besides the second one) haha
One of the greatest games this gen. L4D2 is basically this game now, but all of my memories were with the first one. Good fucking times.
Great GAme lot of Fun

Just as the second game in the series, this game hardly lacks of content. It's just shooting the same kind of zombies all the time, and going rampage with either two pistols or a Desert Eagle. In addition you got about.. 5-6 weapons, from which you can select one and go on the zombie-killing spree, that every boy has a dream, or nightmare, of. This killing spree gets quite monotonous, and you eventually feel, that you've done all this already, and you're just running in circles and going crazy with a couple of lame hand guns.
The game gets 5/10 stars. The first couple of times you play it, it is really fun, exciting and entertaining. However, after that, it gets boring.

Very good survival horror co-op game :) Great soundtrack, awesome graphics, nice gameplay, proper AI. One of the best in it's genre, no wonder it became GOTY :). Highly recommended for co-op and especially horror fans out there! ;)
One of the greatest zombie killing games ever.

Изначально, сама концепция Left 4 Dead не вызывала у меня особого восторга. Отстрел зомби в промышленных масштабах, не первой свежести движок, невнятный сюжет про какой-то очередной вирус - все это не внушало оптимизма. Но, как это обычно бывает у Valve, вся соль у нее в деталях. Удивительно, но четырем колоритным героям игры начинаешь сопереживать, игра захватывает, а продуманный дизайн карт и общая непредсказуемость действия заставляют заново перепроходить уже знакомые локации с неменьшим интересом. Невероятно, но факт.

I love that no matter how many times you play, it always keeps you on your toes! Oh, and the "Rag-Doll Physics" are hilarious.

Left 4 Dead is one of my favorite games of all time, mainly the sequel as it’s 10x better but, this game is still a classic and I love it and have spent countless hours into this. Ultimately one of the most fun games I’ve had with friends is so amazing to just mess around in, meet new people, challenge one another in versus, try for the achieves, etc. Although this game is quite old and has seriously lacking content compared to L4D2 which is seemingly L4D1 but better in every way possible I would recommend not buying this game and getting L4D2 instead as it has all the maps from L4D1 and more…

+4 player online co-op
+Campaign where you have to survive against countless zombies and various special infected progressing through levels trying to escape in the end
+Special infected certain zombies have special abilities making them more deadly than the normal zombies
+Very team dependent and using teamwork is very important making it a lot more fun with how cooperative it is
+Survival where you can try and survive as long as possible in a single map with limited supplies
+Versus where you can do a 8v8 PvP gamemode where one team is the infected playing as the special infected and the other are survivors. Survivors have to try and get as far as possible in the level as the infected have to try and kill them asap. Whoever gets the farthest gets the most points and lots of fun.
+Tons of campaigns
+Funny characters and you can vocalize them often
+Sprays :)
+Steam Cloud
+$2 on sales
+Stats
+Modded servers allowing you to use all kinds of fun cheats like being invincible, flying, being able to build bases, being infected, having 10+ survivors, etc. 
+Can enable cheats in public matches as the host lol
+Able to play as the tank is so awesome
+Can shove zombies away from you

-As you can expect for a 10+ year old game with a much better sequel this games player base is lacking and finding games is relatively low let alone having others join is very rare. You are lucky to see more than 5 games in any gamemode category let alone having anyone actually join you mid match. This game is very old and the majority of the playerbase is playing L4D2 instead. I would recommend to not expect to find many games or to have many join you but to play privately instead or to just not expect any other players
-This game states that it has remote play which I’m already telling you does not work. L4D2 has no split-screen capabilities even though it’s hidden within the games files it takes way too much messing with the games files to get to work. With that I can only assume that this game is the same. Do not expect to be able to do split-screen nor remote play in this game. You could on the Xbox but not on Steam. 
-This game is actually really pointless to buy due to the fact that the sequel Left 4 Dead 2 has everything in this game and more. L4D2 has all of the L4D1 maps, characters, and weapons. Including all the new maps, mods, new gamemodes, and bigger playerbase, etc. Therefore this game isn’t worth buying when the sequel is everything and better. 
-Several times when punching a car as a tank the car will just freeze in place and will never be able to be moved

L4D is a classic zombie and co-op game and honestly I made so many friends in this game. It is one of my favorites because of all the memories and people I met playing this. However this game isn’t worth buying due to the fact that L4D2 has everything this game has and more. Still though nothing wrong about this game besides its dying playerbase still top tier though.

Back in 2010, I used to play the living hell out of this game on my Xbox and I probably have more than 100 hours on it. Look, you know what it is. Zombies, guns, fast paced, Zoey's ass and three hands. THIS is the ultimate party game to have with your friends. I recommend this more than L4D2 just because zombies are more like magnets in the next installment. Want unlimited hours of fun and pain? Download custom maps and play on expert. It really is an experiance.
One of the best Co-op games I have ever played. Excellent replayability and custom maps ensures this game never gets old, although shooting zombies in the face never does
Awesome co-op game! A must play for all FPS fans!
